feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 7:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
